scripts.g-init: git init && git remote add origin %npm_package_homepage%
scripts.first-commit: npm run g-init && npm run g-add-and-commit && npm run g-branch-main && npm run g-checkout-main
scripts.first-push: npm run first-commit && npm run g-push-main
scripts.second: npm run g-add-and-commit && npm run g-push-main
